item.title: 全年营收突破 4160 亿美元，苹果财报创历史新高
item.guid: 全年营收突破-4160-亿美元，苹果财报创历史新高
item.description:
Apple Inc. yesterday announced its Q4 fiscal year 2025 earnings report, with results exceeding market expectations. 苹果公司昨日公布 2025 财年第四财季财报，业绩超出市场预期。

The company expects revenue to grow by 10% to 12% year-over-year this quarter, setting a new historical high. CEO Tim Cook stated that demand for the newly released iPhone 17 series is "beyond expectations," which is a major source of confidence for the company. 公司预计本季度营收将同比增长 10% 至 12%，创下历史最佳水平。CEO Tim Cook 表示，新发布的 iPhone 17 系列需求「超乎预期」，是公司信心的主要来源。

The earnings report shows that for the quarter ending September 27, Apple's revenue was $102.47 billion, higher than the market expectation of $102.24 billion; earnings per share were $1.85, also exceeding analysts' estimates of $1.77. 财报显示，截至 9 月 27 日的季度，苹果营收为 1024.7 亿美元，高于市场预期的 1022.4 亿美元；每股收益为 1.85 美元，也超过分析师预估的 1.77 美元。

By business segment, iPhone revenue was $49.03 billion, slightly below the expected $50.19 billion; Mac revenue was $8.73 billion, exceeding expectations; iPad revenue was $6.95 billion, largely flat; and Services revenue was $28.75 billion, showing significant growth. 分业务来看，iPhone 收入为 490.3 亿美元，略低于预期的 501.9 亿美元；Mac 收入为 87.3 亿美元，超出预期；iPad 收入为 69.5 亿美元，基本持平；服务业务收入为 287.5 亿美元，增长显著。

Cook noted that since the iPhone 17 series went on sale on September 19, some models have been in short supply, and store traffic has significantly increased year-over-year. He emphasized that iPhone revenue in the December quarter will achieve double-digit growth, driving overall record revenue. 库克指出，iPhone 17 系列自 9 月 19 日开售以来，部分机型出现供不应求，门店客流量同比大幅上升。他强调，12 月季度 iPhone 收入将实现两位数增长，推动整体营收创纪录。

Additionally, Apple's revenue in Greater China decreased by 4% year-over-year to $14.5 billion, but Cook expects this market to resume growth this quarter with the strong sales of the iPhone 17 series. The Services business continued its rapid 15% growth, becoming the company's highest-margin segment. The Mac business achieved 13% growth due to price reductions and increased sales of the MacBook Air. 此外，苹果在大中华区营收同比下降 4% 至 145 亿美元，但库克预计随着 iPhone 17 系列的热销，该市场将在本季度恢复增长。服务业务继续保持 15% 的高速增长，成为公司利润率最高的板块。Mac 业务则因 MacBook Air 的价格下调和销量提升，实现 13% 增长。

The report also showed that Apple's net profit was $27.46 billion, a significant increase from $14.29 billion in the same period last year, primarily benefiting from the fading of one-time tax factors. The company's full-year revenue reached $416 billion, a 6% year-over-year increase. 财报还显示，苹果净利润为 274.6 亿美元，较去年同期的 142.9 亿美元大幅增长，主要受益于一次性税务因素的消退。 公司全年营收达 4160 亿美元，同比增长 6%。

item.title: 小米高管回应「巨省电」是空调名
item.guid: 小米高管回应「巨省电」是空调名
item.description:
Recently, some netizens broke the news online, claiming that after consulting Xiaomi customer service, they learned that "Jushengdian" (Super Power Saving) is merely a series name for air conditioners, not a performance indicator. This statement quickly sparked heated discussion. 日前，有网友在网上爆料称，咨询小米客服后得知「巨省电」 仅是空调系列名称，并非性能指标，这一说法迅速引发热议。

According to Jiemian News, on the Black Cat Complaint platform, some consumers reported that the "Jushengdian" air conditioner's cooling effect was mediocre and did not meet promotional expectations; however, some users on social media stated that it was "indeed power-saving, quiet, and easy to use." This difference in experience further amplified the controversy. 据界面新闻报道，在黑猫投诉平台，部分消费者反映「巨省电」 空调制冷效果一般，与宣传预期不符；但也有用户在社交平台表示「确实省电、静音好用」。这种体验差异进一步放大了争议。

According to Dushao Finance, Shan Lianshan, General Manager of Xiaomi Group's Home Appliance Department, responded to the aforementioned incident in an interview. 而据读秒财经报道， 小米集团大家电部总经理单联瑜在采访中回应了上述事件。

For "Jushengdian" (Super Power Saving), the national standard EPF is 5.0. We (Xiaomi) generally achieve 5.27, and ultra-first-class energy efficiency is 5.6, which far exceeds national standards. We are inherently in a very power-saving state.

Shan Lianshan also stated that Xiaomi air conditioners incorporate AI for energy saving: "Through some AI capabilities, our (Xiaomi air conditioners) operate with very high efficiency when turned on, reducing energy consumption by about 30% compared to traditional PID control algorithms. Therefore, we are definitely living up to the name 'Jushengdian' (Super Power Saving)." 同时单联瑜还表示，小米空调做了 AI 的节能，「通过 AI 的一些能力，让我们（小米空调）开机的时候运行的效率非常高，同比传统的 PID 控制算法大概会降低 30% 的能耗，所以我们肯定是名副其实的巨省电。」

Shan Lianshan emphasized, "We hope our name represents both our product's identity and its capability. Therefore, such attacks from competitors don't hold much meaning, as everyone in the industry has various 'power-saving' features like 'True Power Saving,' 'Clean Power Saving,' 'Healthy Saving,' 'Power Saving Hero,' and so on." Shan Lianshan also stated, "We are not particularly afraid of the public opinion's impact on us." 单联瑜强调，「希望我们的名称一个是代表了我们产品的名称，第二个是代表了它的能力建设，所以友商这种攻击其实也没有太多的意义，因为行业里面真省电、净省电、健康省、省电侠……各种省电大家其实都有。」同时单联瑜称，「我们也不是特别惧怕这些舆论上对我们的一些影响。」

According to Time Finance, Shan Lianshan also stated in the interview, "The home appliance industry has been very lively recently, with many topics targeting Xiaomi. Some competitors are even distorting facts. This self-defeating behavior shows that competitors are truly anxious, but the more anxious they are, the steadier Xiaomi becomes." 另据时代财经，单联瑜还在采访中表示，「近期家电圈很热闹，很多话题都是冲着小米来的，某些友商更是颠倒是非，这种自乱阵脚的行为说明友商是真急了，不过友商越急，小米越稳。」

item.title: 零跑副总否认「与华为道不同不相为谋」：我们也很尊重华为
item.guid: 零跑副总否认「与华为道不同不相为谋」：我们也很尊重华为
item.description:
Cao Li, Senior Vice President of Leapmotor Technology, posted on Weibo yesterday, denying that he had ever made the statement "Huawei and I have different paths, so we won't work together." 零跑科技高级副总裁曹力昨日在微博发文，否认曾发表「与华为道不同不相为谋」的言论。

He emphasized that the relevant statements were misinterpretations by some media outlets not present at the time. 他强调，相关表述系部分不在场媒体的曲解。

Cao Li stated that Leapmotor adheres to a strategy of full-domain independent research and development of core technologies, but this does not mean excluding cooperation with other excellent enterprises, adding that "Huawei is a benchmark for China's technological self-reliance and strength, and we deeply respect Huawei." 曹力表示，零跑坚持核心技术全域自研的战略，但这并不意味着排斥与其他优秀企业合作，并称 「华为是中国科技自立自强的标杆，我们非常尊重华为」 。

According to Jiemian News, Leapmotor and Huawei had previously cooperated on the HarmonyOS ecosystem, but this did not involve autonomous driving systems. Data shows that from January to September this year, Leapmotor's cumulative sales reached 396,000 units, ranking first among new car manufacturers, with a single-month delivery of 66,657 units in September, setting a new record. 据界面新闻报道，零跑与华为此前在鸿蒙生态方面已有合作，但并未涉及智驾系统。数据显示，今年 1 至 9 月，零跑累计销量达 39.6 万辆，位居造车新势力榜首，9 月单月交付量 66657 辆，创下新纪录。

item.title: 通用汽车要求近 5500 名员工无薪休假，调整电动车生产计划
item.guid: 通用汽车要求近-5500-名员工无薪休假，调整电动车生产计划
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, General Motors has notified approximately 5,500 employees of temporary layoffs to cope with production pressures caused by the U.S. government's cancellation of electric vehicle tax credit policies. 据彭博社报道，通用汽车已通知约 5500 名员工暂时停工，以应对美国政府取消电动车税收抵免政策带来的生产压力。

This adjustment involves three factories, including the Factory Zero plant in Detroit, which produces models such as the Chevrolet Silverado EV, GMC Sierra EV, and Hummer EV. 此次调整涉及三座工厂，其中包括位于底特律的 Factory Zero 工厂，该厂生产雪佛兰 Silverado EV、GMC Sierra EV 及悍马 EV 等车型。

The report pointed out that General Motors had already placed approximately 3,400 employees on unpaid leave this summer. The company stated yesterday that it would resume single-shift production in January next year and recall about 2,200 employees, while the remaining 1,200 people will continue to be indefinitely suspended . 报道指出，通用汽车在今年夏季已让约 3400 名员工进入无薪休假。公司昨日表示，将在明年 1 月恢复单班制生产，并召回约 2200 名员工， 其余 1200 人将继续无限期停工 。

General Motors emphasized that this move is to re-evaluate electric vehicle production capacity needs and adjust the production pace according to market and policy environments. 通用汽车强调，此举是为了重新评估电动车产能需求，并根据市场和政策环境调整生产节奏。

item.title: 三星第三季度利润飙升 160%，AI 芯片需求成关键驱动力
item.guid: 三星第三季度利润飙升-160%，AI-芯片需求成关键驱动力
item.description:
According to CNBC, Samsung Electronics yesterday released its third-quarter earnings report, showing a significant year-on-year rebound in operating profit, reaching 12.2 trillion Korean won, a 160% increase from the previous quarter, exceeding market expectations. This performance recovery primarily benefited from the surge in demand for memory chips driven by AI servers. 据 CNBC 报道，三星电子昨日公布第三季度财报，显示公司营业利润同比大幅反弹，达到 12.2 万亿韩元，较上一季度增长 160%，超出市场预期。此次业绩回升主要受益于人工智能服务器带动的存储芯片需求激增。

Data shows that Samsung's third-quarter revenue was 86.1 trillion Korean won, a year-on-year increase of 8.85%; operating profit grew by 32.9% compared to the same period last year. Among these, the semiconductor business performed particularly well, with sales reaching 33.1 trillion Korean won, setting a new quarterly high, and operating profit increasing by 81% year-on-year to 7.0 trillion Korean won. 数据显示，三星第三季度营收为 86.1 万亿韩元，同比增长 8.85%；营业利润较去年同期增长 32.9%。其中，半导体业务表现尤为突出，销售额达到 33.1 万亿韩元，创下季度新高，营业利润同比增长 81%，至 7.0 万亿韩元。

Samsung stated that demand for memory chips remains strong, especially with significant growth in sales of High Bandwidth Memory (HBM) products. The company has passed Nvidia's advanced HBM chip certification tests and regained the top position in global memory market share in the third quarter. 三星方面表示，存储芯片需求持续强劲，尤其是高带宽存储（HBM）产品销售显著增长。公司已通过英伟达的先进 HBM 芯片认证测试，并在第三季度重新夺回全球存储市场份额第一的位置。

In addition to the chip business, Samsung's smartphone division also achieved growth. The Mobile Experience and Network business recorded an operating profit of 3.6 trillion Korean won in the third quarter, a year-on-year increase of approximately 28%, primarily driven by sales of the flagship foldable phone model, Galaxy Z Fold7. 除芯片业务外，三星智能手机部门同样实现增长。移动体验与网络业务第三季度营业利润为 3.6 万亿韩元，同比增长约 28%，主要受旗舰折叠屏机型 Galaxy Z Fold7 销售推动。

Samsung executives noted in the earnings call: "We expect data center companies to continue expanding hardware investment to cope with AI infrastructure competition. Consequently, demand for AI-related servers is still growing rapidly and significantly exceeding industry supply." 三星高管在财报电话会议上指出：「我们预计数据中心企业将持续扩大硬件投资，以应对人工智能基础设施竞争。因此，AI 相关服务器需求仍在快速增长，且显著超出行业供给。」

item.title: 微信官宣三大功能更新
item.guid: 微信官宣三大功能更新
item.description:
Yesterday, WeChat officially announced three major feature updates, targeting high-frequency pain points in work scenarios, aiming to improve user communication efficiency and reduce information interference. 昨天，微信官方宣布三大功能更新，针对工作场景中的高频痛点，旨在提升用户沟通效率，减少信息干扰。

    Batch message recall: Supports recalling all content sent this time in one go, including multi-selected forwarded messages, batch-sent pictures, videos, and files, significantly reducing the cost of remediation after accidental sending;

    Group chat do not disturb can set 'exception reminders': After enabling group chat do not disturb, users can now customize the reminder scope for important messages, such as '@me', '@everyone', group announcements, or manually set message reminders for up to 4 important members;

    Delete friends but retain chat history: The new version adds a 'clear chat history' option when deleting friends. Users can uncheck this option to retain conversation content locally, facilitating work traceability or important information retrieval.

WeChat stated that the above features will be gradually rolled out to users, and it is recommended to wait patiently for updates. 微信表示，上述功能将陆续向用户推送，建议耐心等待更新。

item.title: Meta 继续加码 AI 投资：我们已经看到了回报
item.guid: Meta-继续加码-AI-投资：我们已经看到了回报
item.description:
According to CNBC, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg reiterated in yesterday's third-quarter earnings call that the company's significant investment in artificial intelligence is necessary and beneficial in the long run. 据 CNBC 报道，Meta CEO 马克 · 扎克伯格在昨日的第三季度财报电话会议上再次强调，公司在人工智能领域的高额投入是必要且长期有利的。

He stated that it's better to 'over-invest' in AI than to under-invest, as these resources can ultimately yield profitable returns in advertising and app recommendation systems. 他表示，与其在 AI 上投入不足，不如「投入过多」，因为这些资源最终能够在广告和应用推荐系统中实现盈利回报。

Zuckerberg revealed that Meta has spent $14.3 billion this year to acquire Scale AI and reorganized it into 'Superintelligence Labs' to drive the research and development of cutting-edge AI models. To meet computing power demands, the company is expanding its data centers and has signed cooperation agreements with cloud computing companies such as Oracle, Google, and CoreWeave. 扎克伯格透露，Meta 今年已斥资 143 亿美元收购 Scale AI，并将其重组为「Superintelligence Labs」，以推动前沿 AI 模型的研发。为满足算力需求，公司正在扩建数据中心，并与 Oracle、Google 和 CoreWeave 等云计算企业签署合作协议。

He pointed out that Meta might need more computing power than initially expected, but even if there is over-construction, the excess capacity can be used for advertising recommendation systems or gradually absorbed in the future. 他指出，Meta 可能需要比最初预期更多的算力，但即便出现过度建设，也可将多余产能用于广告推荐系统，或在未来逐步消化。

The financial report shows that Meta has raised its capital expenditure forecast for 2025 to $70 billion to $72 billion, higher than the previous range of $66 billion to $72 billion. During the same period, Google's parent company Alphabet also increased its capital expenditure target to $91 billion to $93 billion, while Microsoft expects its capital expenditure growth to accelerate in 2026. 财报显示，Meta 将 2025 年资本支出预期上调至 700 亿至 720 亿美元，高于此前的 660 亿至 720 亿美元区间。同期，谷歌母公司 Alphabet 也将资本支出目标提升至 910 亿至 930 亿美元，而微软则预计 2026 年资本开支增速将加快。

Although Meta's advertising business continued to grow, driven by AI investments, with third-quarter revenue surging 26% year-over-year to $51.24 billion, exceeding market expectations, the company's stock price still fell by about 8% in after-hours trading. In contrast, Alphabet's stock price rose by 6%, while Microsoft's fell by over 3%. 尽管 Meta 广告业务在 AI 投入的推动下保持增长，第三季度营收同比大增 26% 至 512.4 亿美元，超出市场预期，但公司股价在盘后交易中仍下跌约 8%。相比之下，Alphabet 股价上涨 6%，微软则下跌逾 3%。

Zuckerberg emphasized: "We are already seeing returns in our core business, which gives us more confidence to continue increasing investment and ensure we don't under-invest." 扎克伯格强调：「我们已经在核心业务中看到了回报，这让我们更有信心继续加大投资，确保不会出现投入不足的情况。」

item.title: 谷歌推出万圣节吃豆人涂鸦庆祝 45 周年
item.guid: 谷歌推出万圣节吃豆人涂鸦庆祝-45-周年
item.description:
Yesterday, Google launched a special Halloween Doodle mini-game on its homepage to celebrate the 45th anniversary of the classic game Pac-Man. 昨天，谷歌在首页上线了一款特别的万圣节涂鸦（Doodle）小游戏，以庆祝经典游戏《吃豆人》诞生 45 周年。

This Doodle mini-game can not only be played directly on the Google homepage but also features 8 new levels, including 4 haunted house mazes designed in collaboration with Bandai Namco. 该涂鸦小游戏不仅可直接在谷歌首页游玩，还新增了 8 个关卡，其中包括与万代南梦宫合作设计的 4 个鬼屋迷宫。

In the game, players need to control Pac-Man to eat the 'dots' in the maze while avoiding the four ghosts: Blinky, Inky, Pinky, and Clyde. Each haunted house maze reflects the unique atmosphere of different ghosts. Additionally, players can still reverse the situation by eating 'power pellets' to chase the ghosts. 玩家在游戏中需要操控吃豆人吃掉迷宫中的「豆」，同时躲避 Blinky、Inky、Pinky 和 Clyde 四个幽灵。每个鬼屋迷宫均体现了不同幽灵的个性氛围。此外，玩家依旧可以通过吃下「能量豆」反转局势，追击幽灵。

item.title: YouTube 推出美国「自愿离职计划」重组产品团队
item.guid: YouTube-推出美国「自愿离职计划」重组产品团队
item.description:
According to TechCrunch, YouTube confirmed yesterday that it is launching a 'voluntary separation program' in the United States, offering severance compensation to employees who choose to leave. The news was announced by YouTube CEO Neal Mohan in an internal memo. 据 TechCrunch 报道，YouTube 于昨天确认在美国推出「自愿离职计划」，为选择离开的员工提供遣散补偿。该消息由 YouTube 首席执行官 Neal Mohan 在内部备忘录中宣布。

The memo also disclosed that the company will reorganize its product teams into three independent departments reporting directly to Mohan: 备忘录同时披露，公司将对产品团队进行重组，划分为三个直接向 Mohan 汇报的独立部门：

    'Subscription Products' team, responsible for subscription businesses such as YouTube Music, Premium, and OTT;

    'Viewer Products' team, covering viewer experience-related products such as the main app, YouTube Kids, Learning, and Trust & Safety;

    'Creator & Community Products' team, focused on creator support and community building.

YouTube emphasized that this organizational adjustment did not involve job cuts. On the same day the initiative was announced, parent company Alphabet released its third-quarter financial report, showing YouTube's advertising revenue reached $10.26 billion, a 15% year-on-year increase. YouTube 强调，此次组织调整并未涉及岗位裁撤。该举措发布的同日，母公司 Alphabet 公布了第三季度财报，显示 YouTube 广告收入达 102.6 亿美元，同比增长 15%。

item.title: Windows 11 更新引发任务管理器「幽灵进程」
item.guid: Windows-11-更新引发任务管理器「幽灵进程」
item.description:
According to Windows Latest, Windows 11 optional update KB5067036 (Build 26200.7019 or 26100.7019) has caused serious anomalies on some devices: Task Manager does not truly exit after being closed, but instead continuously generates "ghost processes" in the background. 据 Windows Latest 报道，Windows 11 可选更新 KB5067036（Build 26200.7019 或 26100.7019）在部分设备上出现严重异常：任务管理器在关闭后并未真正退出，而是持续在后台生成「幽灵进程」。

Tests show that approximately 30% of virtual machine environments are affected. If users frequently open and close Task Manager, it can lead to a significant consumption of system resources, thereby slowing down overall performance. 测试显示，约 30% 的虚拟机环境受到影响。若用户频繁开启和关闭任务管理器，可能导致系统资源被大量占用，从而拖慢整体性能。

The update was pushed out yesterday, primarily introducing new features such as a revamped Start menu, colored battery icon on the taskbar, and recommended content in File Explorer, while also fixing the inaccurate display of process grouping in Task Manager. However, external observers believe that this very fix triggered a new bug. 该更新于昨天推送，主要引入全新开始菜单、任务栏彩色电池图标以及文件资源管理器推荐内容等功能，同时修复了任务管理器进程分组显示不准确的问题。然而，外界认为正是这一修复触发了新的 Bug。

Actual tests show that if users close Task Manager via the "X" button, the processes do not terminate but instead continuously accumulate. A single instance occupies about 20 – 25 MB of memory; if repeated a hundred times, the cumulative memory consumption can reach 2 GB , potentially causing noticeable lag on lower-spec devices. 实测表明，若用户通过「X」按钮关闭任务管理器，进程并不会结束，而是不断叠加。单次实例占用约 20 – 25 MB 内存，若重复操作百次，累计内存消耗可达 2 GB ，在低配设备上可能造成明显卡顿。

Currently, Microsoft has not yet responded to this issue. Affected users can close processes one by one using the "End task" function within Task Manager, or terminate all instances at once by running "taskkill /im taskmgr.exe /f" in the command prompt. 目前，微软尚未就此问题作出回应。受影响用户可通过任务管理器内的「结束任务」功能逐一关闭进程，或在命令提示符中运行「taskkill /im taskmgr.exe /f」一次性终止所有实例。

It is worth noting that Windows 11 updates have frequently encountered problems this month. The previous October Patch Tuesday update caused abnormal LocalHost connections and Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) failures, prompting Microsoft to urgently release a fix. This Task Manager bug once again raises external concerns about update quality. 值得注意的是，本月 Windows 11 更新频频出现问题。此前的 10 月补丁周二更新曾导致 LocalHost 连接异常及 Windows 恢复环境（WinRE）失效，微软随后紧急发布修复补丁。此次任务管理器 Bug 再次引发外界对更新质量的担忧。

item.title: 与《幻兽帕鲁》纠纷相关，任天堂专利申请遭驳回
item.guid: 与《幻兽帕鲁》纠纷相关，任天堂专利申请遭驳回
item.description:
According to Games Fray, the Japan Patent Office (JPO) recently rejected a patent application from Nintendo related to "Palworld," citing a lack of inventiveness. 据 Games Fray 报道，日本特许厅（JPO）日前对任天堂一项与《幻兽帕鲁》相关的专利申请作出驳回决定，理由是该申请缺乏创造性。

It is understood that the case involves patent application number 2024-031879, which is directly related to Nintendo's ongoing "monster-catching" patent family litigation. 据悉，该案涉及编号为 2024-031879 的专利申请，该申请与任天堂正在诉讼中的「怪物捕捉」专利族直接相关。

The patent examiner pointed out in the non-final rejection notice that the relevant technical solutions have appeared in multiple games, including Studio Wildcard's "ARK," Capcom's "Monster Hunter 4," Pocketpair's "Craftopia," web game "Kantai Collection," and "Pokémon GO." These previously disclosed works were deemed to constitute prior art, thereby weakening Nintendo's patent claims. 专利审查员在 非最终驳回通知 中指出，相关技术方案已在多款游戏中出现，包括 Studio Wildcard 的《ARK》、Capcom 的《怪物猎人 4》、Pocketpair 的《Craftopia》、网页游戏《舰队 Collection》以及《Pokémon GO》。这些先前公开的作品被认定构成现有技术，从而削弱了任天堂的专利主张。

The report indicates that this application is a crucial part of Nintendo's three disputed patents. If it ultimately fails to be granted, it could impact Nintendo's overall "monster-catching" patent strategy. 报道指出，该申请是任天堂三项涉诉专利中的关键一环。若最终无法获得授权，可能对任天堂整体的「怪物捕捉」专利策略造成影响。

Nevertheless, this rejection decision is currently still a non-final conclusion, and Nintendo can appeal by amending the claims or filing an appeal with the Intellectual Property High Court (IPHC). 尽管如此，该驳回决定目前仍属非最终结论，任天堂可通过修改权利要求或向知识产权高等法院（IPHC）提起上诉。

Analysts believe that this rejection highly overlaps with the prior art materials submitted by Pocketpair to the JPO in April this year, leading to widespread speculation that the company might be the third-party submitter. Although this decision will not directly affect the ongoing infringement lawsuit in the Tokyo District Court, the court may refer to the patent office's technical judgment, thereby indirectly influencing the case's direction. 分析人士认为，此次驳回与 Pocketpair 在今年 4 月向 JPO 提交的现有技术材料高度重合，外界普遍推测该公司可能是第三方提交者。虽然该决定不会直接影响东京地方法院正在进行的侵权诉讼，但法院可能会参考专利局的技术性判断，从而间接影响案件走向。

item.title: 索尼诉腾讯游戏侵权案：《荒野起源》禁令听证会延至明年 1 月
item.guid: 索尼诉腾讯游戏侵权案：《荒野起源》禁令听证会延至明年-1-月
item.description:
According to GamesFray, Sony and Tencent have agreed to postpone the preliminary injunction hearing concerning the game "Arclight Rumble" until January 15, 2026, with the exact date still subject to the schedule of Judge Jacqueline Scott Corley of the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California. 据 GamesFray 报道，索尼与腾讯已同意将围绕游戏《荒野起源》的临时禁令听证会推迟至 2026 年 1 月 15 日，具体日期仍需视美国加州北区联邦地区法院法官 Jacqueline Scott Corley 的日程安排而定。

Previously, Sony filed a motion for a preliminary injunction with the court on October 17, seeking to prevent Tencent's promotional activities before the game's official launch, with the hearing originally scheduled for November 20. 此前，索尼于 10 月 17 日向法院提出临时禁令动议，要求阻止腾讯在游戏正式上线前的宣传活动，并原计划于 11 月 20 日举行听证会。

However, due to Sony's lead counsel, Annette Hurst, needing to appear in court that day for discovery in The New York Times' AI copyright lawsuit against Microsoft, and Tencent's request for more time to prepare its defense, both parties ultimately agreed to postpone the hearing. 不过，由于索尼首席律师 Annette Hurst 当日需出庭处理《纽约时报》与微软的 AI 版权诉讼取证事宜，加之腾讯要求延长答辩准备时间，双方最终同意将听证会推迟。

On October 29, Tencent submitted its response brief supporting the dismissal of Sony's lawsuit, reiterating that Sony's character "Aloy" does not possess trademark attributes, arguing that her appearance varies significantly across different scenarios. 腾讯于 10 月 29 日提交了支持其驳回索尼诉讼的答辩文件，重申索尼角色「Aloy」并不具备商标属性，理由是其外观在不同场景中存在较大变化。

Furthermore, Tencent cited multiple different trademarks registered by Disney for "Mickey Mouse" in an attempt to demonstrate that a single character image is difficult to encompass diverse visual representations. 此外，腾讯还援引迪士尼为「米老鼠」注册的多个不同商标，试图证明单一角色形象难以涵盖多样化的外观表现。

In July 2025, Sony filed a lawsuit in California, USA, accusing Tencent's new game "Arclight Rumble" of plagiarizing the PlayStation 4 exclusive game "Horizon Zero Dawn," alleging that elements such as the design of "giant machine animals," visual style, and title font are highly similar to the "Horizon" series. 2025 年 7 月，索尼于美国加州递交诉状，指控腾讯新作《荒野起源》涉嫌抄袭 PlayStation4 独占游戏《地平线：零之曙光》，包括「巨大机器动物」的设计、视觉风格及标题字体等元素均与《地平线》系列高度相似。

"Arclight Rumble" is developed by Tencent's Aurora Studio Group, positioned as an open-world post-apocalyptic survival game. It has completed multiple rounds of testing and obtained a publication license, but the specific release date has not yet been determined. 《荒野起源》由腾讯北极光工作室群开发，定位为开放世界末日生存游戏，目前已完成多轮测试并获得版号，但具体发行时间尚未确定。

item.title: 小鹏科技日定档 11 月 5 日，主题「涌现」聚焦物理 AI
item.guid: 小鹏科技日定档-11-月-5-日，主题「涌现」聚焦物理-AI
item.description:
Yesterday, He Xiaopeng, Chairman of XPeng Motors, announced on Weibo that this year's XPeng Tech Day theme is "Emergence," and it will kick off in Guangzhou on November 5th at 15:00. 昨天，小鹏汽车董事长何小鹏在微博发文宣布，今年小鹏科技日的主题为「涌现」（Emergence），将于 11 月 5 日 15:00 在广州启幕。

He stated that this concept signifies that when technological elements accumulate to a critical point, previously isolated problems will be connected, thereby driving breakthroughs in artificial intelligence in the physical world. 他表示，该概念意味着当技术要素积累到临界点时，原本孤立的难题将被贯通，从而推动人工智能在物理世界的突破。

He Xiaopeng pointed out that the future of AI not only exists in code and on screens but also in becoming an extension and partner of humanity in the physical world. 何小鹏指出，AI 的未来不仅存在于代码和屏幕中，更在于成为人类在物理世界中的延伸与伙伴。

He emphasized that "Emergence" signifies machines possessing stronger understanding and interaction capabilities, no longer merely tools executing commands, but intelligent entities capable of actively responding to complex environments and co-creating with humans. 他强调，「涌现」代表机器具备更强的理解与交互能力，不再只是执行指令的工具，而是能够主动应对复杂环境、与人类协同创造的智能体。

He also revealed that XPeng has achieved multiple breakthroughs in physical AI and will officially showcase them at XPeng Tech Day. He believes this direction concerns human travel, lifestyle, and relationships with super-intelligent entities over the next decade. 他同时透露，小鹏在物理 AI 领域已实现多项能力突破，并将在小鹏科技日上正式展示。他认为，这一方向关乎未来十年人类的出行、生活方式以及与超级智能体的关系。

item.title: Take-Two CEO 谈《GTA 7》：AI 在游戏开发中帮助有限，原创才是根本
item.guid: Take-Two-CEO-谈《GTA-7》：AI-在游戏开发中帮助有限，原创才是根本
item.description:
Strauss Zelnick, CEO of Take-Two, parent company of Rockstar Games, recently stated in an interview with CNBC that he is cautious about introducing artificial intelligence into future titles such as "Grand Theft Auto 7." R 星母公司 Take-Two 首席执行官 Strauss Zelnick 日前在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，对于在《Grand Theft Auto 7》等未来作品中引入人工智能持谨慎态度。

He emphasized that the application of AI in game development faces issues such as intellectual property protection and a lack of creativity, making it difficult to replace Rockstar Games' original content creation. 他强调，AI 在游戏开发中的应用存在知识产权保护与创造力不足等问题，因此难以替代 Rockstar Games 的原创内容创作。

Zelnick pointed out that AI-generated content cannot obtain effective intellectual property protection, which not only affects the company's own rights but also involves respect for the works of others. He believes that AI, being trained on existing data, is essentially "backward-looking" and struggles to create truly innovative content. Zelnick 指出，使用 AI 生成的内容无法获得有效的知识产权保护，这不仅影响公司自身的权益，也涉及对他人作品的尊重。他认为，AI 基于既有数据进行训练，本质上是「向后看的」，难以创造真正创新的内容。

When discussing "Grand Theft Auto 7," Zelnick stated that even if there were no technical limitations, it would be impossible to "press a button" and generate a complete marketing plan, as the results often tend to be "derivative" and lack originality. 在谈及《Grand Theft Auto 7》时，Zelnick 表示，即便技术上没有限制，也无法「按下按钮」就生成一份完整的营销方案，因为结果往往流于「衍生」而缺乏原创性。

He emphasized that Take-Two and Rockstar's goal is to continuously pursue creativity that approaches perfection, and this is precisely what AI cannot replace. 他强调，Take-Two 与 Rockstar 的目标是不断追求接近完美的创意，而这正是 AI 无法替代的部分。

Zelnick also added that AI has value in processing existing data and repetitive tasks, but it still struggles to play a role in areas involving originality and creativity. He reiterated: "The team's creativity is extraordinary, and that has always been Rockstar's core competence." Zelnick 同时补充，AI 在处理既有数据和重复性任务上具有价值，但在涉及原创性和创造力的领域，仍然难以发挥作用。他重申：「团队的创造力是非凡的，而这正是 Rockstar 一直以来的核心竞争力。」

According to previous reports, Zelnick stated at the Paley International Council Summit in Menlo Park, California, that while AI can bring efficiency improvements to game development, its essence is a "language model combining large datasets and computing power," unable to truly create hit titles or demonstrate creativity. 而据此前报道，Zelnick 曾在加州门洛帕克举行的 Paley International Council Summit 上表示，人工智能虽能为游戏开发带来效率提升，但其本质是「大数据集与计算能力结合的语言模型」，无法真正创造热门作品或展现创造力。

It is worth noting that, according to Futurism, another gaming giant, Electronic Arts (EA), "faced severe backlash" in its attempts to integrate generative AI into its daily development processes. 值得注意的是，据 Futurism 报道，另一家游戏巨头 Electronic Arts（EA）在推动生成式 AI 融入日常开发流程的尝试中「遭遇严重反噬」。

Multiple employees stated that the AI tools promoted by the company not only failed to improve efficiency but instead generated a large amount of erroneous code and "hallucinated" content, leading to an increase in repair workload. 多名员工表示，公司推广的 AI 工具不仅未能提升效率，反而生成大量错误代码和「幻觉」内容，导致修复工作量增加。

item.title: 💡 前阿里、字节大模型负责人：AGI 不应是算力竞赛，而是「全民协作」
item.guid: 💡-前阿里、字节大模型负责人：AGI-不应是算力竞赛，而是「全民协作」
item.description:
According to "Intelligent Emergence," Yang Hongxia, former head of large models at Alibaba and ByteDance, founded a new company, InfiX.ai, in July 2024 after leaving ByteDance, and disclosed its latest progress yesterday in Hong Kong. 据《智能涌现》报道，前阿里、字节大模型负责人杨红霞在离开字节跳动后，于 2024 年 7 月创立新公司 InfiX.ai，并于昨日在香港披露最新进展。

Yang Hongxia proposed that large model pre-training should not be a computing power race for a few giants, but rather should adopt a "decentralized" approach, allowing small and medium-sized enterprises, research institutions, and even individuals to participate. 杨红霞提出，大模型预训练不应是少数巨头的算力竞赛，而应通过「去中心化」方式，让中小企业、研究机构甚至个人都能参与其中。

Yang Hongxia previously led the R&D of the M6 large model at Alibaba Damo Academy and later continued to specialize in large models at ByteDance. 杨红霞曾在阿里达摩院主导 M6 大模型研发，后在字节继续深耕大模型方向。

She pointed out that while existing "centralized" models can bring technological breakthroughs, they have limitations in practical applications, especially in data-sensitive and localized deployment scenarios, where post-training struggles to compensate for knowledge gaps from the pre-training phase, leading to frequent hallucination issues. 她指出，现有「中心化」模型虽能带来技术突破，但在落地应用中存在局限，尤其在数据敏感和本地化部署场景下，后训练难以弥补预训练阶段的知识缺口，导致幻觉问题频发。

InfiX.ai's core technical roadmap includes: InfiX.ai 的核心技术路径包括：

    Low-bit training framework InfiR2 FP8: Increases training speed by up to 22% and reduces video memory consumption by 14% with virtually no performance loss;

    Model Fusion Technology InfiFusion: By integrating "expert models" from different domains, it avoids redundant training and enhances knowledge coverage;

    Medical Multimodal Large Model InfiMed: Demonstrates reasoning capabilities exceeding similar models in complex medical tasks such as cancer;

    Multi-Agent System InfiAgent: Can automatically decompose complex tasks and reduce development costs.

Yang Hongxia emphasized that in the future, every enterprise will have its own domain-specific large model, and through model fusion, achieve cross-domain and cross-regional knowledge integration, forming a global foundational model. She believes that Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) should not be limited to a computing power competition among top institutions, but will evolve into "collaboration by all." 杨红霞强调，未来每家企业都将拥有自己的领域大模型，并通过模型融合实现跨领域、跨地域的知识整合，形成全球化的基础模型。她认为，通用人工智能（AGI）不应局限于顶尖机构的算力比拼，而将演变为「全民协作」。

Yesterday, Alibaba DingTalk posted on its WeChat official account, announcing that its first AI hardware, the "DingTalk A1 Youth Edition," officially went on sale yesterday for 499 yuan, bundled with a 177 yuan AI transcription advanced membership. This product is positioned as an "AI companion" for young users, emphasizing lightweight design and high cost-effectiveness. 昨天，阿里钉钉在微信公众号发文，官宣其首款 AI 硬件「DingTalk A1 青春版」已于昨天正式开售，售价 499 元，并附赠价值 177 元的 AI 听记高级会员。该产品定位为年轻用户的「AI 搭子」，主打轻便设计与高性价比。

According to reports, the DingTalk A1 Youth Edition features a 6nm low-power AI audio chip, equipped with 3 omnidirectional microphones and 1 bone conduction microphone, supporting 32GB local storage and 10GB cloud storage. 据介绍，DingTalk A1 青春版采用 6nm 低功耗 AI 音频芯片，配备 3 颗全向麦克风与 1 颗骨传导麦克风，支持 32 GB 本地存储及 10 GB 云存储。

In terms of battery life, the DingTalk A1 Youth Edition has a built-in 660mAh battery, capable of 45 hours of continuous recording and up to 60 days of standby. The device features magnetic adsorption and supports Type-C interface charging. 续航方面，DingTalk A1 青春版内置 660mAh 电池，可实现连续录音 45 小时，待机最长 60 天。机身自带磁吸功能，支持 Type-C 接口充电。

In terms of software capabilities, the Youth Edition is consistent with the Flagship Edition, relying on DingTalk's AI transcription and large model capabilities to support real-time transcription, translation, summarization, and voice analysis, and can seamlessly integrate with DingTalk workflows. 在软件能力上，青春版与旗舰版保持一致，依托钉钉 AI 听记及大模型能力，支持实时转写、翻译、总结与语音分析，并可与钉钉工作流程无缝衔接。

The product also includes AI assistants for over 10 roles such as sales, HR, and administration, capable of automatically generating meeting minutes, action lists, and analysis reports. 产品还内置销售、人事、行政等超过 10 种角色的 AI 助理，能够自动生成纪要、行动清单和分析报告。

Compared to the 799 yuan Flagship Edition, the Youth Edition removes the color display, AI voice button, and leather case configuration, but maintains consistency in core chip, battery life, and noise reduction capabilities. The official statement indicates that this version is more suitable for cost-conscious user groups such as students and freelancers. 与售价 799 元的旗舰版相比，青春版取消了彩色显示屏、AI 语音键及皮套配置，但在核心芯片、电池续航和降噪能力上保持一致。官方表示，该版本更适合学生、自由职业者等注重性价比的用户群体。

Since the launch of the Flagship Edition, multiple enterprises have made bulk purchases for meeting records, sales visits, and human resource management. DingTalk states that the A1 series is helping enterprises accumulate data assets and promote AI-driven organizational development. 自旗舰版推出以来，已有多家企业批量采购，用于会议记录、销售拜访及人力资源管理。钉钉方面称，A1 系列正在帮助企业积累数据资产，推动 AI 化组织建设。

item.title: OpenAI 推出开源安全推理模型，支持自定义安全策略
item.guid: OpenAI-推出开源安全推理模型，支持自定义安全策略
item.description:
Recently, OpenAI released the open-source secure inference model "gpt-oss-safeguard," available in 120b and 20b versions. This model is fine-tuned based on the gpt-oss series, uses the Apache 2.0 license, and allows developers to freely use, modify, and deploy it. 近日，OpenAI 发布了开源安全推理模型「gpt-oss-safeguard」，提供 120b 与 20b 两个版本。该模型基于 gpt-oss 系列进行微调，采用 Apache 2.0 许可，允许开发者自由使用、修改和部署。

According to the official introduction, unlike traditional security classifiers that rely on a large number of labeled samples for training, gpt-oss-safeguard directly reads security policies provided by developers during the inference phase and outputs classification results and reasons through chain-of-thought reasoning. Developers can adjust policies at any time without retraining the model, thereby enhancing flexibility and adaptability. 官方介绍称，与传统依赖大量标注样本训练的安全分类器不同，gpt-oss-safeguard 在推理阶段直接读取开发者提供的安全策略，并通过链式推理输出分类结果及理由。开发者可随时调整策略，无需重新训练模型，从而提升灵活性与适应性。

OpenAI states that the model outperforms gpt-5-thinking and gpt-oss base models in multi-policy classification tasks, especially suitable for scenarios with emerging risks, insufficient samples, or highly complex domains. Its application cases include identifying cheating discussions in gaming forums and screening fake reviews on product review platforms. OpenAI 表示，该模型在多策略分类任务中表现优于 gpt-5-thinking 与 gpt-oss 基础模型，尤其适用于新兴风险、样本不足或领域高度复杂的场景。其应用案例包括游戏论坛识别作弊讨论、产品评论平台筛查虚假评论等。

This release is also accompanied by technical reports and community collaborations. OpenAI collaborated with organizations such as ROOST to test the model and promote the establishment of the "ROOST Model Community" to foster research and practice of open safety tools. 此次发布还伴随技术报告与社区合作。OpenAI 与 ROOST 等机构共同测试模型，并推动建立「ROOST Model Community」，以促进开放安全工具的研究与实践。

However, OpenAI also pointed out two major limitations of the model: first, its performance may still be lower than that of specialized classifiers trained on large-scale, high-quality samples; second, the inference process has a large computational overhead, making it difficult to apply on a large scale in real-time across all platform content. 不过，OpenAI 也指出该模型存在两大局限：一是性能仍可能低于基于大规模高质量样本训练的专用分类器；二是推理过程计算开销较大，难以在所有平台内容中大规模实时应用。

The model is now open source on Hugging Face. 该模型现已在 Hugging Face 上开源。

item.title: MiniMax 推出新一代语音模型，主打超低延时与智能文本处理
item.guid: MiniMax-推出新一代语音模型，主打超低延时与智能文本处理
item.description:
Yesterday, MiniMax posted on its official WeChat public account, formally releasing the new generation speech model MiniMax Speech 2.6. 昨天，MiniMax 在官方微信公众号发文，正式发布新一代语音模型 MiniMax Speech 2.6。

According to reports, this upgrade focuses on the "Voice Agent" scenario, achieving significant breakthroughs in latency, professional text processing, and speech naturalness, aiming to provide more powerful infrastructure support for real-time voice interaction. 据介绍，此次升级聚焦于「Voice Agent」场景，在延迟、专业文本处理及语音自然度上实现显著突破，旨在为实时语音交互提供更强大的基础设施支持。

The official statement claims that the core highlights of this update include three major performance improvements. 官方称，本次更新的核心亮点包括三项主要性能提升。

    Fully optimized audio generation pipeline, achieving end-to-end ultra-low latency of less than 250 milliseconds;

    Added direct intelligent conversion capability for multi-language non-standard text formats (such as URLs, emails, phone numbers, amounts, dates), allowing accurate reading without complex pre-processing;

    Introduced "Fluent LoRA" technology, which allows for the output of highly fluent and natural speech while replicating the original timbre, even if the original voice material has issues such as accents or lack of fluency; this feature supports over 40 languages.

It is reported that MiniMax Speech is becoming one of the core engines in the global voice intelligence field, currently providing underlying technical support for well-known voice platforms such as LiveKit, Pipecat, Vapi, and various smart hardware products. 据悉，MiniMax Speech 正成为全球语音智能领域的核心引擎之一，目前已为 LiveKit、Pipecat、Vapi 等知名语音平台及多款智能硬件产品提供底层技术支持。

item.title: 谷歌发布街景无障碍原型系统，AI 实时描述场景
item.guid: 谷歌发布街景无障碍原型系统，AI-实时描述场景
item.description:
Recently, Google's research team unveiled a prototype system called StreetReaderAI at the UIST'25 conference, aiming to make Street View services more accessible to blind and low-vision individuals through multimodal artificial intelligence. 近日，谷歌的研究团队在 UIST’25 大会上发布了名为 StreetReaderAI 的原型系统，旨在通过多模态人工智能让街景服务对盲人和低视力群体更加友好。

According to reports, the system combines real-time AI descriptions with accessible navigation controls to provide users with an immersive virtual Street View exploration experience. 据介绍，该系统结合实时 AI 描述与可访问的导航控制，为用户提供沉浸式的虚拟街景探索体验。

The core functions of StreetReaderAI include: StreetReaderAI 的核心功能包括：

    Real-time generation of voice descriptions for roads, intersections, and surrounding locations;

    Engaging in dynamic conversations with users via multimodal AI to answer questions about the scene and geographical environment;

    Supporting voice commands and keyboard shortcuts for panning and moving through Street View;

    Offering two modes: "Navigation Safety" and "Tour Information," focusing on travel assistance and tourist commentary, respectively.

The research team invited 11 blind users to test the system in a laboratory environment, and the results showed that participants gave the system a median overall usefulness score of 7 out of 7. 研究团队在实验室环境中邀请 11 位盲人用户进行测试，结果显示参与者对系统的整体有用性评分中位数为 7 分（满分 7 分）。

In over 1,000 AI requests, the AI Chat feature was used 6 times more frequently than AI Describer, indicating that users prefer to obtain personalized information through conversation. The system achieved an 86.3% accuracy rate in answering questions, but misjudgments and missing information still occurred. 在超过 1,000 次 AI 请求中，AI Chat 功能的使用频率是 AI Describer 的 6 倍，显示用户更倾向于通过对话获取个性化信息。系统在回答准确率方面达到 86.3%，但仍存在误判和信息缺失的情况。

Researchers point out that StreetReaderAI is expected to expand to route planning and richer audio feedback, such as 3D soundscape simulation, in the future. Although currently still in the proof-of-concept stage, the project is considered an important step in promoting the accessibility of street view tools. 研究人员指出，StreetReaderAI 未来有望扩展至路线规划和更丰富的音频反馈，例如 3D 声景模拟。尽管目前仍为概念验证阶段，该项目被视为推动街景工具无障碍化的重要一步。

item.title: 腾讯元宝升级数据分析功能：一句话生成可视化图表
item.guid: 腾讯元宝升级数据分析功能：一句话生成可视化图表
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Yuanbao announced the completion of multiple core function upgrades, allowing users to quickly complete complex analysis and generate visual charts using natural language commands without opening spreadsheet files. 昨天，腾讯元宝宣布完成多项核心功能升级，用户无需打开表格文件，仅需通过自然语言指令即可快速完成复杂分析并生成可视化图表。

According to reports, the new functions cover five core scenarios: 据介绍，新功能覆盖五大核心场景：

    Descriptive analysis: One-click output of key features such as data distribution, trends, and dispersion;

    Difference analysis: Supports A/B testing scenarios, quickly verifying the significance of differences between two data sets;

    Cluster analysis: Achieves user segmentation and profiling, and can predict the group to which new data belongs;

    Correlation analysis: Uncovers correlations between variables, assisting in attribution diagnosis;

    Function plotting: Adapts to mathematical and physical problem solving, and can also be used in daily life scenarios such as financial modeling.

In terms of usage, users upload files or paste data via the Yuanbao App, desktop version, or web version, and input an analysis request (e.g., "Analyze the trend of sales over time"), and the system will automatically return results and charts. 使用方面，用户通过元宝 App、电脑版或网页版上传文件或粘贴数据，输入一句分析需求（如「分析销售额随时间的变化趋势」），系统将自动返回结果与图表。

According to previous reports, Tencent Yuanbao recently also strengthened its file processing capabilities, supporting direct Excel editing, format conversion, and deep data mining. 据此前报道，腾讯元宝近期还强化了文件处理能力，支持直接编辑 Excel、格式转换及深度数据挖掘。

The Yuanbao team stated that this upgrade aims to "make data analysis as natural as a conversation," helping users free themselves from repetitive operations and focus on decision-making itself. 元宝团队表示，此次升级旨在「让数据分析像对话一样自然」，帮助用户从重复性操作中解放，聚焦决策本身。

item.title: 微信支付落地泰国，接入 PromptPay 实现「一扫即付」
item.guid: 微信支付落地泰国，接入-PromptPay-实现「一扫即付」
item.description:
Yesterday, WeChat officially announced on its official account "WeChat Pay" that WeChat Pay has officially connected to Thailand's national payment system, PromptPay. Chinese tourists traveling in Thailand can now open WeChat Pay's scan function to directly scan QR codes with the "PromptPay" logo at local merchants and complete payments. 微信官方昨天在公众号「微信派」发文，宣布微信支付正式接入泰国国家支付系统 PromptPay，中国游客在泰国旅行时，打开微信支付扫一扫功能，即可直接扫描当地商户带有「PromptPay」标识的二维码并完成支付。

According to reports, the newly integrated PromptPay system currently covers millions of merchants across Thailand in scenarios such as dining, retail, attractions, and transportation, making the payment experience more convenient. 据介绍，新接入的 PromptPay 系统目前已覆盖全泰国餐饮、零售、景点、交通等场景内的数百万商户，支付体验将更为便捷。

item.title: 星巴克：同店销售连续两季正增长，利润率稳步提升
item.guid: 星巴克：同店销售连续两季正增长，利润率稳步提升
item.description:
Yesterday, Starbucks released its Q4 and full-year fiscal 2025 results. Data shows that the Chinese market maintained steady growth in core indicators such as revenue, comparable store sales, and profit margins, demonstrating a continuous recovery and high-quality development momentum. 昨天，星巴克发布 2025 财年第四季度及全财年业绩。数据显示，中国市场在营收、同店销售和利润率等核心指标上均保持稳健增长，展现出持续复苏与高质量发展的势头。

In the fourth quarter, Starbucks China's operating revenue reached 831.6 million USD, a year-on-year increase of 6%, achieving four consecutive quarters of growth; full-year 2025 revenue was 3.105 billion USD, a year-on-year increase of 5%. 第四季度，星巴克中国营业收入达 8.316 亿美元，同比增长 6%，实现连续四个季度增长；2025 全财年收入为 31.05 亿美元，同比增长 5%。

Same-store sales achieved positive growth for the second consecutive quarter, increasing 2% year-on-year , and same-store transaction volume increased 9% year-on-year. Store operating profit margin remained in double digits and improved quarter-on-quarter for four consecutive quarters. 同店销售额连续第二个季度实现正增长， 同比 增长 2%，同店交易量同比提升 9%。门店经营利润率保持在两位数水平，并连续四个季度 环比 提升。

In terms of store expansion, 183 new stores were opened in the fourth quarter, with a net increase of 415 stores for the full year. As of the end of the fiscal year, the total number of stores nationwide reached 8,011, covering 1,091 county-level cities. New stores continued to contribute above-average comparable store sales within two years, demonstrating strong profitability. 在门店扩张方面，第四季度新开 183 家门店，全年净新增 415 家。截至财年末，全国门店总数达到 8011 家，覆盖 1091 个县级城市。新开门店在两年内持续贡献高于均值的同店销售，展现出强劲的盈利能力。

Liu Wenjuan, CEO of Starbucks China, stated that multiple indicators reached record highs in the fourth quarter, with product innovation and the "Starbucks Delivers" business becoming the core drivers of growth, and the economic benefits of new stores laying a solid foundation for future expansion. 星巴克中国首席执行官刘文娟表示，第四季度多项指标创下历史新高，产品创新与专星送业务成为增长核心动力，新开门店的经济效益为未来扩张奠定坚实基础。

item.title: 2026 北京《米其林指南》发布：新增二星餐厅，首颁「导师厨师奖」
item.guid: 2026-北京《米其林指南》发布：新增二星餐厅，首颁「导师厨师奖」
item.description:
Recently, Michelin released the 2026 Beijing Michelin Guide. 近日，米其林发布了 2026 北京《米其林指南》。

This year, a total of 99 restaurants were selected, including 32 starred restaurants (2 three-star, 6 two-star, 24 one-star), 26 "Bib Gourmand" recommendations, and 41 "Michelin Guide Selected Restaurants." The overall number is slightly smaller than last year, but the list still brings several new changes. 今年共有 99 家餐厅入选，其中包括 32 家星级餐厅（2 家三星、6 家二星、24 家一星）、26 家「必比登推介」以及 41 家「米其林指南入选餐厅」。整体数量较去年略有收缩，但榜单仍带来多项新变化。

In the Michelin-starred restaurant section, Chao Shang Chao (Chaoyang) and Xin Rong Ji (Xinyuan South Road) continued to retain their three-star ratings. The number of two-star restaurants increased from 4 last year to 6, with newly promoted Black Swan and Lán Zhai both moving up from one star. Among them, Black Swan achieved a "two-level jump" within just over a year of opening, demonstrating strong growth momentum. 在星级餐厅部分，潮上潮（朝阳）与新荣记（新源南路）继续蝉联三星。二星餐厅数量由去年的 4 家增至 6 家，新晋的黑天鹅与兰斋均由一星升档。其中，黑天鹅自开业一年多便实现「两级跳」，展现出强劲的成长势头。

Regarding one-star restaurants, three new establishments were added this year, including Chao Shang Chao (Xicheng), Rong Pao, and House of Full Seven Fortunes. At the same time, Huaiyang Fu (Dongcheng) and Xiang Ai (Gongti East Road) were downgraded to "Michelin Guide Selected Restaurants," while Fulin Fandian and Ling Long exited the list due to closure. 一星餐厅方面，今年新增 3 家，包括潮上潮（西城）、荣袍与家全七福。与此同时，淮扬府（东城）与湘爱（工体东路）降至「米其林指南入选餐厅」，富临饭店与玲珑则因闭店退出榜单。

Notably, this year's list marks the first time the "Mentor Chef Award" has been presented in mainland China, awarded to Chef Zhang Yifeng of Chao Shang Chao (Chaoyang) in recognition of his long-term contributions to the industry. 值得关注的是，本次榜单首次在中国内地颁发「导师厨师奖」，由潮上潮（朝阳）主厨张一峰获得，以表彰其对行业的长期贡献。

In addition, Chef Cheng Jixiang of Huaixiang Guose received the "Young Chef Award," sommelier Chen Wen of Black Swan received the "Sommelier Award," Wei Wei of Rong Pao received the "Service Award," and King's Joy continued to retain the "Green Star Award." 此外，淮香国色主厨程吉祥获「年轻厨师奖」，黑天鹅侍酒师陈文获「侍酒师奖」，荣袍的魏巍获「服务奖」，京兆尹则继续蝉联「绿星奖」。

In the "Bib Gourmand" section, eight new restaurants were added this year, covering various styles such as Cantonese, Sichuan, Hunan, and Beijing cuisines, further highlighting the diversity and inclusivity of Beijing's dining scene. At the same time, some long-listed restaurants, such as Gong De Lin, dropped off the list for the first time, attracting industry attention. 在「必比登推介」部分，今年新增 8 家餐厅，涵盖粤菜、川菜、湘菜及京菜等多种风格，进一步凸显北京餐饮的多元化与包容性。与此同时，部分长期上榜的餐厅如功德林则首次落榜，引发业内关注。

item.title: 《Hello Kitty》大电影定档 2028 年 7 月登陆北美
item.guid: 《Hello-Kitty》大电影定档-2028-年-7-月登陆北美
item.description:
According to Variety, Warner Bros. Pictures Animation and New Line Cinema announced that the Hello Kitty movie will be released in North America on July 21, 2028. 据 Variety 报道，华纳兄弟影业动画与新线影业宣布，《Hello Kitty》大电影将于 2028 年 7 月 21 日在北美上映。

It is reported that this marks Hello Kitty's first appearance on the Hollywood big screen, with the film featuring Hello Kitty and her companions embarking on an adventure story for a global audience. 据悉，这是 Hello Kitty 首次登陆好莱坞大银幕，影片将以 Hello Kitty 及其伙伴为主角，展开一场面向全球观众的冒险故事。

The director is Leo Matsuda, who previously directed the short film Inner Workings and participated in the production of Zootopia and Wreck-It Ralph . The latest version of the script was written by Dana Fox, who participated in the creation of Wicked . Producer Beau Flynn collaborated with Sanrio founder Shintaro Tsuji for nearly a decade to finally obtain the character adaptation rights. 导演由曾执导短片《Inner Workings》并参与《疯狂动物城》《无敌破坏王》制作的 Leo Matsuda 担任，剧本最新版本由曾参与《Wicked》创作的 Dana Fox 撰写。制片人 Beau Flynn 与三丽鸥创始人辻信太郎合作近十年，才最终获得角色改编权。

This film project was first announced in 2019, marking Sanrio's first authorization of Hello Kitty's film adaptation rights. In addition to Hello Kitty, characters such as Gudetama, My Melody, and Little Twin Stars may also appear in the film. 此次电影项目最早于 2019 年公布，是三丽鸥首次授权 Hello Kitty 的电影改编权。除 Hello Kitty 外，蛋黄哥、My Melody 与双子星等角色也可能出现在影片中。

It has not yet been confirmed whether Hello Kitty will speak in the movie. Previously, in many animated works, the character has always maintained a non-speaking setting. 目前尚未确认 Hello Kitty 是否会在电影中开口说话。此前在多部动画作品中，这一角色始终保持无口设定。

item.title: 《即兴谋杀》北京首映
item.guid: 《即兴谋杀》北京首映
item.description:
Recently, the film Impromptu Murder held its "Fatal Feast" premiere in Beijing. Director Cheng Yanan, screenwriter and producer Ping Hui, and lead actors Li Gengxi, Deng Jiajia, Yue Jiayi, and Zhao Yinyin attended the event to share insights into the film's creation and character experiences with the audience. The film will officially be released nationwide tomorrow. 日前，电影《即兴谋杀》在北京举行「致命盛宴」首映礼。导演程亚楠、编剧兼制片人平辉，以及主演李庚希、邓家佳、岳佳颐、赵胤胤出席活动，与观众分享影片创作与角色体验。影片将于明日正式全国上映。

The film tells the story of He Siyi (played by Li Gengxi), the only daughter of a wealthy family, who falls into a castle murder plot meticulously laid out by her stepmother Wu Liyun (played by Deng Jiajia) upon returning home. Director Cheng Yanan stated that the film's escalating sense of horror is "a concretization of human greed and evil desires," with money, emotion, and power being the core incentives driving the hunt. 该片讲述豪门独女何思怡（李庚希 饰）归家后陷入继母吴丽云（邓家佳 饰）精心布下的古堡杀局。导演程亚楠表示，影片层层递进的惊悚感是「人心恶欲横生的具象化」，而金钱、情感与权力是推动猎杀局的核心诱因。

Screenwriter and producer Ping Hui revealed that the film features multiple twists, with each turn accompanied by strong emotional impact. Li Gengxi stated that although her character knew the ancient castle held traps, the drive for revenge led her to "enter the game." Deng Jiajia expressed that Wu Liyun's ambition was central to the character, but uncontrollable desires ultimately led to a loss of control. 编剧兼制片人平辉透露，影片设计了多重反转，每一次转折都伴随强烈的情感冲击。李庚希则称，角色虽明知古堡暗藏陷阱，但复仇驱动让她「以身入局」。邓家佳表示，吴丽云的野心是角色的核心，但无法驾驭的欲望最终导致失控。

item.title: 《极地大冒险3》明天上映
item.guid: 《极地大冒险3》明天上映
item.description:
The family-friendly animated film Niko 3: Beyond the Northern Lights will be released in mainland cinemas tomorrow. This new installment in the classic adventure comedy series has a runtime of 85 minutes, covering animation, action, and drama genres, continuing the series' lighthearted and humorous style while achieving comprehensive upgrades in visual effects and narrative. 合家欢动画电影《极地大冒险3》将于明天在内地院线上映。这部经典冒险喜剧系列的新作时长 85 分钟，类型涵盖动画、动作与剧情，延续了系列轻松幽默的风格，并在视效与叙事层面实现全面升级。

The core story revolves around "Santa's sleigh going missing," where Niko not only faces the challenge of saving Christmas but also has to make choices between growth and responsibility. The production team emphasized that this work achieved technological breakthroughs in fur rendering and scene construction, striving to create an immersive Arctic spectacle. 故事核心围绕「圣诞老人的雪橇失踪」展开，尼科不仅要面对拯救圣诞的挑战，还将在成长与责任之间做出抉择。制作方强调，本作在毛发渲染与场景构建上实现技术突破，力求营造沉浸式的极地奇观。
